creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: T-shaped panel; three areas--two rectangular and one central L-shaped area; left area is red; central L-shaped panel with abstract design--blue at left fading to grey with grey and white shell-like shape and white linear forms at right; right panel with abstract designs in brown, golden tan and cream
marks: Signature and Title on back, in pencil: [then again / steven sorman]
title: Then Again
